page.title: 17RELIGION in RHAYADER
page.content: {Rev.Canon R.M.Davies,Vicar}of St. Clement's,Rhayader;St.Mark's,Ysfa;St. Cynllo's,Nantmel{.Rev.G.Davies,Vicar of St.Bride's,Cwmdeuddwr;St.Garmon,St. Harmon;St.Gwrthwl,Llanwrthwl;Nantgwilt in Elan Valley. {Fr.Kenneth Gillespie {O.F.M. Parish Priest}of St.Francis Roman Catholic Church,Rhayader;Friary at Our Lady and St.Richard Gwyn at Llanidloes.{Fransiscan Missionaries of {Mary}at St.David's Convent.{Rev.W.U.C. {Sewell,Minister}of United Reform Church (formerly Tabernacle Congreg- ational Chapel),also Minister for Penuel Chapel,Llanwrthwl and Carmel, Nantmel.He is also the provisional ecumenical officer for Wales.{Rev.R.F. {Williams (rtd) U.R.C.}District Link Minister for Wales.The Presbyterian and Baptist Chapels have no resident ministers,ecumenical services being a regular feature.
